name: Baby Rush
description:
Baby Rush is 3D Multiplayer game made during Global Gam Jam 2021.

You lost your Teddy Bear in the playground. You have to find it first while preventing other players from finding theirs. Baby Rush is a multiplayer FPS game, where you seek your teddy and try to stop other players with various diaper gun, traps and power up.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/baby-rush-2

Controls:

Use  mouse to control camera

Clic left for fire 

Scroll to change between the two weapons  

Keyboard wasd or zqsd to move
